description.value: This massive sports grid and concert venue requires three expansion bays and can be installed only on Huge or larger starships. Extensive seating, speakers, and vidscreens allow someone using the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.73lSOAnF2qMQLWoS.JournalEntryPage.OstVErCUe16Ja0p2]{entertain} downtime activity (Starfinder Character Operations Manual 152) to affect up to 200 willing creatures. The DC of their entertain check is equal to 10 + 1 per 20 creatures they’re entertaining + 1-1/2 × the average character level or CR of those they’re entertaining.
